content.detailedDescription: I was getting home from work when my wife said what are them lights it was nothing like we seen before then they started coming towerd us i got worried told my kids and wife to get inside  did know what to do so we went inside
content.summary: They were 4 of them then 1

content.detailedDescription: I was getting home from work when my wife said what are them lights it was nothing like we seen before then they started coming towerd us i got worried told my kids and wife to get inside  did know what to do so we went inside

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:00pm or shortly after i was traveling
east on interstate highway 10 to seguin from san
antonio, at approximately 75 mph.  somewhat past or
east of san antonio raceway i noticed a white light to the
southeast between 2:00 and 3:00 bearing.  it was low to 
the horizon, 10 to 15 degrees above the far tree 
at first it did not seem unusual, as there is a small airfield
in the area that side of the highway and it was about the altitude of a small plane 
as if it were on approach with a landing light on.  at this point
it was a bright single point of light, no features seen, as it
was dusk, an almost dark sky.  initially seemed to be moving
slowly north, then i took notice as it apparently accelerated and 
sped across the highway moving north at what i thought was
"military" speed, as if it were a trainer from nearby randolph afb
going all out.  i thought this unusual for the location and altitude.
as it passed to between a 9:00 and 10:00 bearing to the north
from my traveling position, from that angle it either revealed itself as 2 equal 
lights or split into 2, i could not tell, but in close formation.  then abruptly they faded out
quickly, first the second, then the first.  there was 
no  clouds or haze, they just faded into the clear.
i think if they were usaf trainer aircraft there was 
enough light for me to have seen the aircraft bodies.
which i see fairly often across this road.  also, i
a little surprised when i could not make out any
aircraft attached to the lights when they crossed
the highway.

this struck me as unusual for several reasons.
i did not think these were meteors as the flight path
was low on the horizon, perfectly horizontal to
the ground, and i appeared to be gaining on
their path as i drove.  also, they were points of 
light, there were no tails or smoke.

i don't think it was a civilian light plane due to its
apparent speed.

i don't think they were military, could not see the
craft, no strobes, red lights and light appeared constant
both coming and going.  the second light did not 
seem quite right for wingtip lights...This might still be a 
possibility, but they still seemed odd.

drones?  rate of speed seemed too much for someone
hoaxing with small drones.

that's it.  i see the aircraft that frequent this area quite often
and these don't seem to fit the bill  got a few goosebumps when these
lights faded out and disappeared.  

i would be interested to hear if there were any other sightings
ar this time or other explanations.
content.summary: A single light moving quickly horizontally south to north became or revealed as 2 lights before fading out

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation in hawaii with my family when we decided to see an astrology show, as we did the last time we visited. while waiting for the astrologer to set up, i looked up at the stars, but because of the hotel's light, i blocked it out with my hands to see them better. everything was still in the sky, as far as i can tell, although a few seconds later, i saw one of the stars moving father down the sky. reminding myself that they were only stars, i ignored it and thought that it was my eyes playing tricks on me because of how dark it was. the star stopped moving as soon as my eyes readjusted, but a few seconds later it, again, moved further down the sky. this time i payed closer attention to what was happening. it had stopped moving, but, like before, it started moving after a few seconds, but this time it did not stop. it made a left, but wide, turn really fast, but because i was ready for it i noticed that it wasn't turning, but was making straight lines at different angles, probably only three or four, impossibly fast. after it made a half circle in the sky, it paused for a second and took off extremely fast and kinda made a short light streak in the sky. i must've blinked because suddenly it was gone. because it was so high in the sky i could not tell if it had done any other flying manoeuvres. after seeing this event, i was not sure what to believe, i just thought that it was my imagination, but after watching 'hangar 1: the ufo files' and listening to what other people have encountered, it made me believe that what i saw did, in fact, happen. keep in mind though, that there is a military base somewhere close by because there are military airplanes that come and go on a regular basis, probably practicing their piloting techniques. it's hard to remember how many days past, but i'm pretty sure that it was only one or two, two            blackish-camouflage military helicopters flew over my hotel heading in the general direction of where the airplanes usually take-off and land. this event stands out because in my time there, i never saw any helicopters. these ones' though were definitely special-ops or something because they looked like they belonged in a war or a war scene in a movie. also, this was in the middle of the day and everyone saw them since we heard them coming. i did not see who was inside, although they obviously did not care about who saw them since they flew so low.
content.summary: Star-like object that can do unbelievable flying stunts at high altitudes during the night.

content.detailedDescription: In 1963 i had a life changing event witch i can not explain. i felt as though i was awaken from a sleep. i felt as though time was taken or stopped.I was guided and i seen cities and a rush of informaion was pored into my mind.I was placed back. and my mom found me,after looking for me.I have spent my life asking this, why?. this is the second time i have reported this. its not a hoax. thats all. i also seen a red round ball.At a differnt time afyer this.
content.summary: Event 1963

content.detailedDescription: The incident took place at the above address  shortly after 9:00 pm 13 july 2014. while walking my dogs i began to look at the moon rising in the eastern night sky. weather conditions were clear, no clouds, visibility was unlimited. at about 9:20pm, the inbound american airlines flight from mia caught my attention. it was a s-80 in the standard approach path this flight would take for runway 31. i worked for aa over 16 years and a total of 24 years combined at bna with other fbo's and aa. being in the tca and landing pattern, the aircraft engines were throttled back producing the expected noise of a jet aircraft in landing configuration. as i looked at the flight move away from my vantage point, i caught the glint of an alternating red and white light to the right of the s-80 but in the same direction, just higher altitude. the light pattern did not mimic the characteristic red on left, green on right with white strobe underneath seen on all civil aircraft. the light appeared distinctive and very close together giving the impression a single object. the general speed of the object appeared faster than most aircraft types but not so dramatic as to be impossible. what i did observe was the light appeared to make abrupt turns to the north, appear to stop or hover, then turn back to the east, hover for a moment, then descend rapidly all the while the tight alternating red and white pattern was maintained. my perception of altitude changes were made using the power lines as a reference against the night sky. these abrupt changes in altitude and directions continued for more than a minute till the object was lost in the glare of a street lamp across from where i was standing. i moved my fist to block the light and quickly scanned the area before finally catching site of the object  now moving in a westerly direction. instead of the red and white pulsing light , the object appeared to have just two tightly spaced white lights and was making a rapid but controlled decent to lower altitude with no apparent sound. i watched until the object was out of my sight above the tree line and hill west of where i was standing. i opened my phone app to the flight watch radar and noted it had the aa flight and others in the tca marked with appropriate flight numbers and identification and flight path. there were also two tracks one to the east and near parallel to the earlier aa flight and another on a westerly descending track, both  unmarked indicating something may have registered on the radar but not identified by flight plan or transponder code. i scanned the sky for a few minutes just to rule out police or life flight helicopters and observed no other aircraft in the general area. time at end of observation was 9:58pm central time
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed aa flight in bound 9:20 pm. red and white alternating light along easterly path higher altitude changes directions quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in kananaskis country riding my motorcycle. i stopped to take a break and took a photo of my bike. i noticed when i reviewed my pictures i saw this strange object in the photo. i pasted it on facebook as a joke saying i have captured a ufo. then i got thinking what could it actually be. it looks bigger from the distance away that it is bigger than a bird. it does not look like a plane either. lastnight while watching tv i stumbled upon your show. i thought of this pic taken a couple of years ago and thought i would send it out. unfortunatly the date stamp is defienetly incorrect and the date i am giving you is a questimate.

anyway just found it intreging and wanted to know what you guys thought.

pic 3827 is the original and pic 3827_2 is taken from the same pic just blown up so i could figure out what it is. only one picture was taken.

thanks,

andrew
content.summary: I took a picture of my bike and think i may have captured a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Let me start this way, i never believed in ghosts or ufo
i saw both!
im sitting in my car with a friend in parking lot, suddenly there is light which came out of the clouds
i knew it was a ufo because i had seen lots of ufo videos before on youtube. it was a very bright light, glowing. and somehow i had this feeling that it knew i was looking at it. i knew they were looking back. it was maybe 2 miles away. my friend saw i was shocked
he asked whats up with you? i was still looking at it, then it started moving pretty fast like it moved one mile in one second, i turned to my friend to tell him to look there and it was gone.
i had a question? aliens have laws of their own like thay know what butterfly effect is, but what creeps me is why they show themselves to us, r we in danger in this planet, r they scared if our powers 
some have red light
some blue
some have red blue green
i think they want to show us how strong they are
i think ppl should know they r here
there should b cameras in everyone houses
they r creepy
u dont play hide and seek with a girl unless u want to do it with her! they r creepy
i dont trust these creatures
they havent hurt us yet but they might b doing it one ny one and we would never know
maybe they r waiting for humans to find sth they still havent
just creepy
content.summary: A bright light came out of clouds, it was like it saw me, moved away so fast, i know what i saw!

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch smoking a cigarette, and this flashing light caught my eye. i thought it was a shooting star or an airplane, but it was flying too high to be a plane and shooting stars don't hover or change direction. it became a little more visible and i could make out an oval shape. it was moving towards to east at a moderate pace, stopped and hovered for about a minute, and then started heading north east. i was feeling kind of bewildered and amazed because i knew what i had seen. i couldn't do anything but stare at it until it started moving a little faster. i saw a really bright flash of light, brighter than the random occasional flashes it had been omitting. after the flash, it just shot straight up into the sky and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw this flashing thing in the sky that was too high up to be a plane; it hovered, changed directions then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Unfortunately my dates and times are not accurate. this was about 15 years ago, however this event has profoundly changed my opinion of what reality on earth may be. i never got around to reporting it, because at that time, hell, i was only 12. i was sitting in the driveway waiting for my mom to take me to hockey practice i'm the afternoon sometime.  suddenly out of my right eye i feel a flash of light(may have been reflecting the sun). i glance over and i see a solid black/gray football shaped craft emerging from the woods and rocking while banking towards the next group of wooded area. from where i was sitting the craft was less than 100 feet away from me in broad daylight and clear skies. 

 it appeared like a football on its side with the top and bottom hemispheres slightly off center. it had what almost looked like black corrugated tubing stretching from front to back of the craft. another part about the instance that i have to express is the movement of the craft. as soon as the bright flash happened i'm not sure if the being controlling the craft was startled or lost control, but the way how it rocked while it was banking made me believe that whatever piloting it had an "oh crap" moment. if there was a person inside it, surely it would have vomited from the rocking. maybe it was autonomous. that's the only reason why i bring up the movement. it may have been some sort of drone. ours? maybe. it had no wings or visible engine and was absolutely silent. 

  maineville used to be pretty rural at that time, it headed towards what used to be a farm. i only saw it for about 30 seconds but the 30 seconds has been burned into my head for quite some time.  i wish i had accurate time and dates. maybe someone else saw this. i've never seen any other ufo report about anything like what i saw. trust me since i was 12 i've been obsessed with this. i've researched everywhere and watched countless videos trying to find a match of what i saw, which now leads me to reaching out to others. i know what i saw. i saw it close and in broad daylight. you can't tell me it was a blimp, it was less than 100 feet away from me. this was real. if a sketch is needed, i'll do my best.
content.summary: Football shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside in georgetown ontario when a friend noticed an bright orange-red light. we took out our phones and took picturesand vvideos. the object moved around in the same area for afew minutes while it ffaded then got brighter. then it took off in one direction moving pretty quickly
content.summary: Appeared out of nowhere then hovered in the same area before taking off in a different direction

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside in georgetown ontario when a friend noticed an bright orange-red light. we took out our phones and took picturesand vvideos. the object moved around in the same area for afew minutes while it ffaded then got brighter. then it took off in one direction moving pretty quickly
content.summary: Appeared out of nowhere then hovered in the same area before taking off in a different direction

content.detailedDescription: On july 5th about 10 pm my family and i were sitting around the firepit when out of the corner of my eye ,i saw what appeared to be a star moving. concerned that i was seeing thins, i asked my wife to look at it and for her to tell me what she had seen. well she confirmed along with my two daughters that it was moving. what ever these crafts are they appeared to be starlike with the colors white,blue yellow red and green, only through the binoculars, but primarily white and blue. the family was quite astonished by this sighting. personaly i cant see them being of military or commercial projects because i have never seen anything move like this, very erratic with up and down, side to side movement sometimes casting an ora. the evening progressed into morning when we noticed the secong and the third craft,same exact coloring and movement. at times they appeared to be sinaling each other with red and green flashes. i don't know what i was looking at, and being over 50 yrs old, never in my live have iever seen anything like this.
content.summary: Unbelievable starlike object

content.detailedDescription: I was outside walking and listening to some music with headphones and i looked straight up in almost a 90 degree angle,slightly in a southwesterly  direction ,and i saw a very bright star-like object moving very slowly to the west in a straight line path.I ran inside the house to get my mother to see this,and she came outside and also noticed that it was slowly moving and very  bright.To us it seemed to be moving too slow to be a satellite and we both ruled out a weather balloon because it had a very star-like glowing quality of light light to it and the sky was very bright blue at about 7:50 pm.I went inside to get my binoculars and saw a slight change in it's shape from round to a bullet shaped...It had a slight red outline behind it. we watched it for about 10 or 15 minutes until it faded and i noticed it separated into 2 faint halves until it disappeared all together.We stayed about 5 minutes after trying to figure what we both witnessed.
content.summary: Bright star-like object on a bright blue sky evening moves very slowly and then split into 2 parts while fading

content.detailedDescription: It was about 9:45pm, and i was standing with my friend facing north on site c18 at bluffview camp grounds on clearwater lake, when out of the corner of my eye i saw a orange glow to the west. it was completely silent moving east with a slight northerly directional change near the end of the event. my wife who was heading back from the shower near by, and neighbor on c19 to the north, were also able to get a look at it. about mid way thru the sighting i looked at it with my binoculars. it had a bright yellow glow in the center like a 60w light bulb surrounded by a red/orange blur. a few seconds before we lost sight, the object moved irraticly then it was out of sight. the event lasted no more than three minutes from my perspective. i knew there were sightings around this lake in the 70s from locals telling me stories when i was a kid. so i brought the field binoculars just in case we saw something. i have been looking up for years and finally i cought something i can truly say was unidentifiable. ironically it is in the place whare i was first turned on to ufo's and basic astronomy. this was definately not an airplane or helicopter. i know enough about known aircraft to prevent a misidentification.
content.summary: Red/orange ball silently moving west ti east at bluffview camp ground clearwater lake.

content.detailedDescription: my friends and i were walking down the street when someone pointed it out. we all looked up at it and their was a lot of lights just moving in a zigzag pattern. we got it on a snap chat video but that's gone now. i have photos and the lights are all wavy and really fat. we thought it was a plane at first but then planes don't move in a circle. my mom later saw the video and she even thinks its not a plane or helicopter. we lost sight of the object because we ran back home and we looked back and it was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It had alot of lights and it didnt move like a helicopter or plane.

content.detailedDescription: On sunday, june 8th 2014, while traveling south on main st. west haven, ct, i  initially noticed unusual contrail formations. i proceeded to videotape the footage at 11:13 am. at which time, two flashing objects at the top of my field of view appeared and disappeared quickly. they then shifted position drastically. they went from 3 o'clock and 9 o'clock to 6 o'clock and 12 o'clock and back within a second. i then stopped the car, stepped out, aimed my camera in the direction of the aerial illuminations and took two photos at 11:14 and 11:15. i later discovered two dark disc shaped objects appearing to hover and seemingly unrelated to the contrail laden sky, a potential third object is possible due to the disc shaped hole in the cloud, within the first picture. the second picture taken immediately after shows one clear, dark, disc shaped object appearing to accelerate to the east. a faint contrail or atmospheric disturbance is evident. furthermore, the leading edge of the object gave off a yellowish orange glow. perhaps a coronal discharge from a potential electrogravitic propulsion system, however, this is only speculation. i only noticed these details sometime later while zooming in on the photos.
content.summary: Initially flashing. seemingly shifting on video. 2 pics. hovering then sped away

content.detailedDescription:
Estabamos realizando una ceremonia de meditacion espiritual y encuentro con la madre tierra  en la cual estabamos unas 10 personas,todas vestidas de blanco por la ocasion de demostrar pureza y amor a la naturaleza

yo , mientras mis compa��eros estan en canticos y oracion, me dedico siempre a tomar fotos, para encontrar posibles imagenes espirituales o esotericas o imagenes desconocidas

al enfocar hacia la estupa , vi por unos segundos ese objeto en forma de huevo, posado , son realizar movimiento alguno e inmediatamente dispare la camara varias veces.

me parecio lo que sospecho es; algo desconocido y que podria ser un ovni.

el objeto aparecio de repente, de la nada, estuvo frente a la estupda, como veran en la foto, unos 20 o 30 segundos, sin movimiento alguno y d repente, como si fuese increible, desaparecio, violentamente hacia la derecha sureste.Sin dejar rastro de nada, ni ruido.

mi reaccion fue de asombro, de expectacion y de alegria, al poder, creo yo, haber tomado la foto de eso.

el objeto , una vez lo vi y le tome la foto, desaparecio en dos segundos a una velocidad no normal.,como un flash,
content.summary: Cilindro grisaceo, posado durante unos 40 segundos frente a la estupa

content.detailedDescription: I saw the program about the texas windmill incident and it reminded me of an experience my grandmother had in approx. 1897- the family farm was in the spring green area right by the house on the rock where the farm was- she was born in 1888 or so and mention she was a child in the fields doing farm work with the family- something flew overhead- i asked her what it looked like- she said a cigar- the story on tv recalled her incident to me and hasn't been related before- the timeline seemed to coincide- i know it's hard to get info from that far back but i got it directly from her- she never had dementia and passed at 106 years old- she related it to me in 1973- we just happened to be talking about a lot of interesting subjects and she was always as sharp as a tack- farm wife and highly religious woman- just thought i'd pass it on- she said she was a child- not a teenager- and would have been 7 to 10 years old at that time- if there was anyway to track that object thru newspapers or something headed south thru the midwest towards texas- i hope this will put a pin in your map-
content.summary: Grandmother working in the fields as a child-aprox. 1897-cigar shape

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: All day, ufo has been flying over the city, white disk. zooms over clouds, flying back out, and circling.
content.summary: White disk like to cigar shape ufos fly over omaha

content.detailedDescription: my father & mother, approx. 1968 in morgan hill, california, saw the underbelly of a "traditional" ufo- round shape, colored moving lights around the edges. they were standing under a walnut tree when they saw it.  later in life, dad would return from camping trips in the area between mexicali, mex and tijuana/ensenada called la rumorosa.  he'd come back almost in a panic telling us w/urgency that he was seeing hundreds upon hundreds of ufos traveling northward--california(?). i too, am now quite concerned of what i have seen in the sky for years now.  i have no one to talk to, feel kind of alone, don't trust. my last event happened evening of june 25,this year, 2014 approx. 10 pm.  what i have seen has changed me, so my now life i am compelled to look upward - day & nights.  almost daily, i sit or stand on top of a solidly-build shed, appox 6.5 feet high.  there i scan the sky carefully. (dad taught me how: look 1st w/your eyes.  this world aircraft should fly on somewhat of a flat plane -right, i.E., not up & down unless severe weather.  should fly on a straight path, not sideways, etc, then when you spot something suspicious, then quick, grab your binoculars, telescope, etc!)  anyhow, this evening i was standing on the shed, looking to southwest direction.  all of the sudden from just left of a wood utility pole that was in my view, (behind next door neighbor's house) i saw a red orange basketball size ball moving ever so slowing acroos the sky, going eastward, like towards mexicali mexico. it was far away, maybe 5 - 10 miles away?  the color was burning hot sun, but no flames, nothing, just a sun-like round. this thing stopped in mid-air 2x for a few seconds, then continued its path.  poeple on interstate 8, going west must have seen it.  pleas report it!! there is so much ufo activity here imperial county. i live amongst law enforcement & legal profession, so in too much fear of ridicule to "share."
content.summary: Exact color as a red/orange hot burning sun!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was at home mowing grass.  the circle was approx. 120 yards behind my house.  the black on the grass felt like graphite.  there were what seemed to be 3 outriggers spaced evenly around the circle. about 3 feet out from the circle.  the black washed off when it rained
content.summary: Aprox 9 ft black  circle (5 in wide) on lawn grass. the grass  was coated with black substance which  came off on my hand .  the grass was not damaged and washed off by rain

content.detailedDescription:
We were camping by the seneca lake in sampson state park south of geneva, ny.
campground is an old large military base.
red light (much larger than any star) appeared in the northern horizon (above the tree line). it was moving closer toward us. there was no sound! it came close to being overhead and started turning toward west.
as it turned, the large red light slowly disappeared, making it apparent that it was only pointing forward from the object. the object seemed to be on a circular path. in about ten minutes the same object appeared in the same spot in the sky and flying the same path as the first time only this time staying little further north. this happened two more times. this red light was never blinking or changing in any way except for the disappearance. to all of us watching it seemed that the object was moving in a slightly fluctuating speed although keeping a steady path. the overall speed was that of a helicopter. it was a clear night and the camp was a quiet place, yet none of us could hear any sound.
content.summary: Red light flying slowly in a large circular path

content.detailedDescription: On sunday,july 13th 2014, i was standing outside in my driveway talking to a relative i haven't spoken to in 22 years.My peripheral vision caught something above the treetops about two houses down. i looked up and saw a solid metallic looking blue sphere was flying above the houses and treetops  in a straight line heading south right toward my direction.The object slowed down as it crossed over my street. this allowed me to get a very good look at it. it had no visible openings, propellors, and was completely silent. as i attempted to activate my phone camera, the object quickly picked up amazing speed and continued  south along the same very straight path. i watched it until it disappeared from my view. it was too far away to get a picture once i was ready. i noted the time immediately it was 6:57 p.M. i immediately ran inside to tell my family what had happened. my sister and i went back outside and witnessed the strangest cloud formation either of us had ever seen. we were both moved to tears by what appeared in the photos we took. the craft wasn`t in the photos, but what the photos showed was not apparent to our naked eye. two police cruisers came down our street right then, and one officer stopped and asked us if we had seen or heard anything strange. i didn`t mention the ufo, as something within me felt it unwise. what an amazing day..One i will never forget. i have included a photo of the strange cloud formation and double rainbow that appeared afterward, as somehow i feel that it`s pertinent.
content.summary: A solid blue, reflective sphere. no apparent openings, propellors, or lights.

content.detailedDescription: Around 10 pm on july 13 2014 i was outside with my girls shortly after seeing a greenish colored meteor or comet went over head it was pretty big. we seen several what appeared to be a star but then it started moving and changing colors we seen this several times over where i live we have witnessed this before mainly in july around the 4th during the evening hours me and several other witnesses seen a pinkish colored orb or something it was moving north north west we watch it till we couldnt see it anymore because of the mountains
content.summary: Around 10 pm was ouside shortly after seeing a greenish comet or meteor seen what appeared to be stars moving and hovering changing colors

content.detailedDescription:
1) took a casual picture of night sky at  ‏‎6:03:19 pm.

2) observed an object in that picture after 1 min, but was not visible from 
   naked eye !

3) immediately took another picture at ‏‎6:04:27 pm, the object changed its 
   position already.

4) took another picture, but no object observed.


p.S.- i am a practical man, i understand physics very well, i can differentiate between usual and unusual things very precisely.
and, this event was unusual. 

attaching pictures, these are genuine pictures , i strictly against 
misleading the world.

also attaching raw images, captured from nokia 41mp mobile camera.
content.summary: Not visible from naked eye...But was visible in camera pictures...

content.detailedDescription: Approximatly 5:30 pm on sunday 7/13/2014 while playing golf at mt dell gc my son spotted a slow moving object heading up the canyon and north. i also was able to observe the object with the naked eye and immediatly knew it was not a normal aircraft. i happen to have a two eyed binocular type golf range finder that i also used to observer the object ar a closer range. the object had a unique shape similar to the old appolo lunar landing vehicle but without the legs to land on. i was metallic looking with a grey or charcoal color. the object pulsated a bright white light that appeared to have either been self contained or sunlight reflection. i observed the light coming from different sided of the object so my opinion is that it was not a sunlight reflection. we both watched it for about 20 minutes as it moved north up the canyon then west over some foothills then it appeared to move higher then lower then dissapeared behind the foothills. it reappeared just above the foothill and i was able to take a few minutes of video on my iphone before it moved out of site. the object appeared to be in survelience mode moving slowly and not making any fast moves, turns or evasions. i have inspected the video i shot and did get the object recorded but it does not appear on the video very clear but one can see the object moving from left to right just above the foothills. i would estimate the distance as about 5-10 miles from where i located. hope you find this interesting!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My 10 yr old spotted a slow moving object about 1000 ft high in parleys canyon

content.detailedDescription: Checking my night camera at home the morning of the 13. over 400  shots taken with nothing to observe. 2 of the 400 had these things in them. i've seen them on a tv program before but don't recall in what regard.
content.summary: Spiral shape with extensions

content.detailedDescription: It was dark out close to 9 pm when my boys 20 & 14 & i decided to go walking as we usually do each night. the difference this time is we are in a new area there about a week or so; close to the airport in austin, tx. we were walking in the direction towards the airport. we frequently enjoy taking nature walks and seeing new things, creatures, bugs, flowers, trees etc. on this particular night my youngest was looking for a snake we had seen earlier when we were arriving home. i enjoy watching the airplanes coming and going. some are so close they seem like they are going to fall on us. we are located approximately a 1/2 mile or so from the airport. we were just watching as a plane was coming in for a landing from w to e (about). when my youngest yelled and pointed look. we all looked up at the sky when he joked it's an alien. it was in the s - sw direction side of the airport. the first thing i noticed was the ball of bright lights; not being able to see well without glasses i didn't think much until i noticed the speed. i was like wow that's super fast. i would approximate the area from ground where i image it wouldve been on land to the area it wouldve arrived at in a straight direction as maybe 30 miles or so. it went that distance in about the 10 - 15 seconds we watched. then in the next second i said whoa as an airplane crossed the exact path leaving the airport from e - se(in an x type of crossing not a t). i said that was close. as we continued to watch the 8 shaped orb. it looked as if it were a figure 8 laying on it's side. two perfectly round bright shaped orbs. then i started wondering even without my glasses why i can't see the wings and tail in the early dusk hours as i usually can. we watched other planes further away and we could see the wings and tail. and i thought where are the wings and tail on this one. at that point it separated into two orbs. the back one disappeared and within a second the first one disappeared. as we all stood there in the middle of the road in shoke we didnt know what to say. i asked the boys to explain what the saw. they said exactly what i saw. my son checked the time and it was exactly 9:05 pm. after thinking for a moment i told the boys there was no way it would or could have been a plane. the airport would not put two airplanes in the same direct path of each other. only moments from missing each other had it not been for the speed of the ufo. then as we thought about it we believe that it was not on figure 8 shaped vessel but rather two orbs probably "racing" or "chasing" the other. from our view they looked connect but could have be semi side by side to appear to be one. we though wow this is amazing and had hoped to see more sightings. we definitely will be spenind more time out doors investigating but will be ready with a camera next time.
content.summary: Myself and my two sons were walking at night, in close vicinity to the airport. we recently moved to the area and enjoy watching the planes take off. when my youngest son 14 pointed and said look. we noticed something going by at an high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my mother, aunt and neighbors were sitting on the front porch when we seen what we thought was a helicopter because it was so low. as it got closer we could see two light blue lights parallel that moved super fast. i tried to chase it down the road but it was going so fast. nothing i have ever seen could move that fast, nothing!!! twas an ufo! i feel star struck theres no way what i saw was a meteor. it wasnt falling from the sky it was moving parallel to the ground just above the tree tops. the two lights stayed in line with each other having one in front and one behind. the distance between the two never changed. it zoomed past at a crazy speed but didnt make and noise at all. strangest/coolest thing i've ever seen!
content.summary: Two lights traveling at high speed.
